last_episode_to_air.name: The Eternal Phantom World
last_episode_to_air.overview: Enigma storms the Alayashiki research facility.

name: Myriad Colors Phantom World
original_name: 無彩限のファントム・ワールド
overview: In the near future, in a world born of human imagination, what humans would call ghosts or monsters appear, and they come to be called "phantoms." Haruhiko Ichijō, is a first year at Hosea Academy along with his upperclassman Mai Kawakami, who fights phantoms with the ability "Spirit of Five Elements," Reina Izumi, who has the ability "Phantom Eater," and Koito Minase, who fights phantoms in solitude. They experience the ups and downs of high school life before a certain incident leads them to the truth of this world.

episodes.name: Age of Phantoms
episodes.overview: Clumsy Haruhiko and violent Mai need more people on their Phantom-fighting team. They meet a Phantom Eater, Reina.

episodes.name: Take Out the Annoying UFO!
episodes.overview: The team sets out to deal with security robots turned Phantom. But it turns out that Minase Koito was already there, fighting the haywire robots with her beautiful voice.

episodes.name: Operation Copy-Paste Memories
episodes.overview: A pair of Phantoms terrify people as they try to cross a bridge. The team goes to investigate, and Mai begins to remember something odd about the place.

episodes.name: Fake Family
episodes.overview: After a huge victory feast with the team, Reina vanishes on a mysterious bus, hypnotized.

episodes.name: I Can't Use My Special Abilities
episodes.overview: A vicious Phantom attacks the rabbit hutch at school. Koito is tasked with hunting it down, but she hurts her throat, shutting down her abilities.

episodes.name: Kurumi and the Teddy Bear Kingdom
episodes.overview: Kumamakura Kurumi sucks Haruhiko and the gang into a fantasy world inside her own mind, filled with talking bears and giant mushrooms.

episodes.name: Schrödinger's Cat Mansion
episodes.overview: The team investigates the spontaneous cat-ification of the school's students.

episodes.name: Break Through the Monkey Hot Spring!
episodes.overview: Hosea Academy is invaded by a band of pervy hot spring monkeys.

episodes.name: The Strange Tale of the Bakumatsu Phantom
episodes.overview: The team gets recruited to perform in a play about a Phantom in medieval Japan. As they're rehearsing, Koito notices the presence of a real Phantom nearby.

episodes.name: Little Ruru's Big Dream
episodes.overview: A witch Phantom grants Ruru's wish to become human. She gets her wish, but...

episodes.name: Tiny Haruhiko-kun
episodes.overview: Haruhiko returns to his childhood -- literally -- and he doesn't remember ever being any older.

episodes.name: The Mother Hath Returned
episodes.overview: Reports abound of a Phantom attacking students and taking their special abilities. Meanwhile, Haruhiko is reunited with his mother.

episodes.name: The Eternal Phantom World
episodes.overview: Enigma storms the Alayashiki research facility.
